sentences.en: A beard doesn't scratch, it just tickles.
sentences.cn: 下巴上的胡子不刮人，就是叫人痒痒。

sentences.en: A beginning beard faintly shadowed his chin and lean cheeks.
sentences.cn: 从他的下巴和瘦削的面颊上可以依稀看到刚长出来的胡须.
比尔精心修剪了他的胡须。

sentences.en: He disguised himself with a wig and false beard.
sentences.cn: 他用假发和假胡须来乔装.

sentences.en: He has decided to grow a beard and a moustache.
sentences.cn: 他已经决定留起络腮胡子和髭。

sentences.en: He was unrecognizable without his beard.
sentences.cn: 他刮掉胡子，无人认得出他了。

sentences.en: He's decided to grow a beard.
He's had his beard shaved off.
His beard was just beginning to show signs of grey.
sentences.cn: 他的胡子才刚有点泛白。

sentences.en: I don't like myself without a beard.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢自己没胡子的样子。

sentences.en: I've decided to shave away my beard.

sentences.cn: 吉姆沉思着捋了捋胡子.

sentences.en: Just because he has a beard doesn't necessarily mean he's a hippy.
sentences.cn: 不能因为他蓄须就说他是嬉皮士。

sentences.en: She finds his beard too bristly.
sentences.cn: 她觉得他的胡须太扎人.

sentences.en: This false beard is his disguise.
sentences.cn: 这假胡子是他的伪装用品.

sentences.en: This old man shaved his shaggy black beard.
sentences.cn: 这老人剃掉了他浓而粗的胡子.

words.tran_cn: 有芒的；有胡子的；有须的
无须的；无芒的；乳臭未干的；年轻的
使长胡须（或芒刺等）（beard的过去分词）

phrases.phrase: beard the lion in his den (或 lair)
phrases.tran_cn: 在狮穴捋狮须，太岁头上动土

trans.tran_en: hair that grows around a man’s chin and cheeks
